en-US.summary: Stream your music from Kodi to Alexa
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Koko to play Radiohead
Alexa, tell Koko to play alternative playlist
Alexa, tell Koko to play Limousine by Brand New
en-US.name: Koko
en-US.description:
Koko is the only solution for streaming music from Kodi so you don't need to have your TV on when you want to listen to music.

All it takes is to follow the simple setup instructions at https://lexigr.am and you'll be up and running in no time!
